sentences.en: Crass materialism causes people to forget spiritual values.
sentences.cn: 极端唯物主义使人忘掉精神价值.

sentences.en: Crass protested against the introduction of politics in that meeting.
sentences.cn: 克拉斯反对在会上谈论政治.

sentences.en: Crass shivered with cold as he lit the gas - jets.
sentences.cn: 克拉斯在点煤气灯,冷得直抖.

sentences.en: Crass stood the final round of drinks.
sentences.cn: 克拉斯付了最后一巡酒钱.

sentences.en: Crass was about thirty - eight years of age, rather above middle height and rather stout.
sentences.cn: 克拉斯大约三十八岁, 中等身材,身体很结实.
克拉斯的外表跟他的为人非常相称.

sentences.en: Crass's fat face was pallid with fear as he clung tremblingly to his seat.
sentences.cn: 克拉斯死抱着座位发抖,他那肥胖的脸吓得铁青.

sentences.en: He continually criticized England for its crass materialism.
sentences.cn: 他不断批评英国过于宗拜物质.

sentences.en: I didn't want any part of this silly reception. It was all so crass.
sentences.cn: 我完全不想参加这个无聊的欢迎会. 它实在太糟糕了.
这简直是赤裸裸的最后通牒!

sentences.en: Loud applause greeted the conclusion of Crass's remarks.
sentences.cn: 克拉斯的讲话在热烈掌声结束.

sentences.en: Pop records can be crass and cynical.
sentences.cn: 流行音乐唱片可能会是冷酷而且愤世嫉俗的。

sentences.en: The family has been described variously as crass, bigoted, racist and plain boring.
sentences.cn: 人们对这家人有各种不同的评价：愚蠢、顽固、有种族偏见和无聊透顶，不一而足。

sentences.en: There were many crass minds in Middlemarch.
sentences.cn: 在米德尔马契有不少冥顽不灵的人.

sentences.en: We were thus facing a crass challenge.
sentences.cn: 我们就面临着粗暴的挑衅.

trans.tran_cn: 愚笨的，粗鲁的，非常的，彻底的
trans.tran_en: behaving in a stupid and offensive way which shows that you do not understand or care about other people’s feelings
